text: Itu is a community in Ezinihitte Mbaise Local Government Area of Imo State. Most people refer to it as Itu Mbaise. This is because there is another town known as Itu in Cross River State. Itu is a town known for palm wine production business, palm oil and agricultural produce. Politically, It is the heart of Ezinihitte Local Government since it has the LGA headquarters situated in Itu. Category:Populated places in Imo State
title: Itu, Imo State
